class.name: YieldTweener
class.description: [YieldTweener] is used to wait for a specified signal to be emitted, allowing asynchronous steps in [SceneTreeTween] animation. See [method SceneTreeTween.tween_yield] for more usage information.

method.name: set_timeout
method.description: Sets the maximum time a [YieldTweener] can wait for the signal. Can be used as a safeguard for signals that may never be emitted. [code]timeout[/code] should be greater than [code]0[/code]. If not specified, the tweener will wait indefinitely.
